promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic serpent water-type pokemon with a ornate tail. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquatilisk, a a dynamic basic serpent water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Escort, Flying Stomp. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "water" or "Aquatilisk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, serpent-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: Often found gliding through sea realms, this fluid creature uses Escort to shield allies while Flying Stomp creates tidal disruptions.
